author: Anonymous Calc
title: can't open DrRacket
question: I was the first person to update my macOs before the midterm2 and found it isn't compatible with DrRacket and posted my experience on the piazza. Actually the DrRacket always smash since midterm 2 and today I can't open it at all. I tried to uninstall it and install another version and it also doesn't work. I don't know what to do.
instructor_answer:
It would have been easier to help you with this if we had known it was still a problem sooner. I will try to get a hold of Emily and see what she says.
Edit from Emily: Please email cpsc110-admin@cs.ubc.ca ASAP.
